section.heading: Private and public patients; bond for support and maintenance; sufficiency and justification of sureties.

annoGroup.heading: References in Text
annoGroup.annotation: Section 21-1108, referred to in the first sentence of subsection (a) of this section, was repealed by the Act of March 3, 1979, D.C. Law 2-137, § 604(a)(1).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Section 35 of D.C. Law 19-169 provided that no provision of the act shall impair any right or obligation existing under law.
